citation: Proclamation under the Corrections Amendment Act 2023 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Corrections Amendment Act 2023

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Corrections Amendment Act 2023 fix 30 September 2023 as the day on which that Act commences.

11 September 2023

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Corrections and Rehabilitation

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 20 September 2023

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
